buttonStyle.description: The style of RadioButton is currently available in two styles: stroke and fill
buttonStyle.description_zh: RadioButton 的风格样式，目前有描边和填色两种风格

name.description: The 'name' attribute of all 'input[type="radio"]' under the RadioGroup
name.description_zh: RadioGroup 下所有 `input[type="radio"]` 的 `name` 属性

:options.description: Set up child elements as a configuration
:options.type: string\[] | number\[] | Array<{ label: ReactNode; value: string; disabled?: boolean; }>
:options.description_zh: 以配置形式设置子元素

optionType.description: Lets you set the Radio 'options' type
optionType.description_zh: 用于设置 Radio `options` 类型

size.description: size, which is only valid for button styles
size.description_zh: 大小，只对按钮样式生效

value.description: Lets you set the currently selected value
value.description_zh: 用于设置当前选中的值

events.name: onChange
events.description: The callback function when the option changes
events.description_zh: 选项变化时的回调函数
